segments.text: I find myself feeling a bit frustrated with the woman in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely unaware of what's happening around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is clearly overflowing, creating a substantial mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water seeping into her shoe or onto her skin?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable, her level of concentration on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children, practically dismantling the cookie jar right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so reckless, the boy on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This passive ignorance is frankly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before things get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
